Constructor Detail

DynamicDocument

public DynamicDocument(String metadataName,
                       String nvpTableName,
                       String docId,
                       com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean optionalThrowException,
                       com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean runLoadScript)
Creates a new dynamic document instance of the specified metadata type.

Parameters:
metadataName - String The fully qualified metadata document name. This can be static or dynamic metadata element.
nvpTableName - String Optional. Must be specified if the metadata document is static one. If the metadata document is dynamic and the NVP table name is specified it takes precedence over the NVP table name in the metadata.
docId - String Optional document id. If specified the document is read from the database
optionalThrowException - If not specified or true throws exception if the document with the specified id is not found in the database. If false and a document with the specified id does not exist in the database a new empty document is created and the document id is set to the specified value.
runLoadScript - if true or not specified the document load script will be executed
Method Detail

addDynamicLeaf

public void addDynamicLeaf(LeafElement leafDefinition,
                           String triggerMethod)
Adds a dynamic leaf to the dynamic document

Parameters:
leafDefinition - an instance of LeafElement that represents the leaf
triggerMethod - Optional: Name of a method of the metadata document The method is fired in the following cases: - when checkbox or select field of the dynamic document is changed in UI; - when "runTriggers" method is invoked.
Throws:
Throws - exception if the LeafElement.name is not unique within the document

createLeaf

public void createLeaf(String name,
                       String label,
                       com.conceptwave.scripting.Object type,
                       com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer arraySize,
                       com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer length,
                       com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer precision,
                       String codeTable,
                       String triggerMethod)
Adds a new leaf to the end of the dynamic document.
If type parameter is a metadata type name, then label, length, precision and codeTable parameters are optional:
If any of these parameters is null, then it takes the parameter value from the data type. If the parameter is not null, it uses the specified value replacing the data type setting.
If the document is finalized an exception will be thrown.

Parameters:
name - The leaf NVP name. If the name is not unique in the document a exception will be thrown.
label - The leaf label translation Id
type - The leaf data type (0 - Number, 3 - String, 4 - Boolean. See CwfDataType) or a metadata data type name.
arraySize - If > 0 the leaf value is array with this size
length - The type length (If String or Number)
precision - The type precision
codeTable - Optional code table name;
triggerMethod - Optional: Name of a method of the metadata document The method is fired in the following cases: - when checkbox or select field of the dynamic document is changed in UI; - when "runTriggers" method is invoked.

getDynamicLeafByName

public LeafElement getDynamicLeafByName(String name)
